titleStmt.title: An epistle of a Catholicke young gentleman, (being for his religion imprisoned.) To his father a Protestant Who commaunded him to set downe in writing, what were the motiues that induced him to become a Catholicke.
titleStmt.author: N. N., fl. 1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed with licence. [i.e. printed by the English Secret Press],

notesStmt.note: End of text on p. 40 dated: 15. day of August, being the 46. th weeke of my imprisonment, 1614.
Identified as STC 10431 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1270 and at reel 1525 (both are Bodleian copy).
